languages.text: {n}Дознаватель со вздохом опускает руку и смотрит на то, во что превратилась сущность внутри клетки. Влажно поблескивающая масса мяса и хрящей, в которой нет уже и намека на человеческое происхождение, упруго пульсирует.{/n} "И это все? Причитания умирающих людей? Нет. Не просто причитания. То, что оно сказало про надежду, звучит как ложь Хаоса, с помощью которой он гнездится в слабых умах. Полагаю, пораженные скверной техножрецы повторяли эту фразу как эхо того, что внушили им... что бы не планировал культ Последнего восхода, лживая надежда — ключевой компонент их плана. Это зацепка. Пусть маленькая, но зацепка".

{n}With a sigh, Heinrix lowers his hand and looks at what the creature within the cage has become. A wetly gleaming mass of meat and gristle that no longer bears any hint of its human origins, it pulses vigorously.{/n} "And that's it? The lamentations of dying people? No. Not just that. What it said about hope sounds like a lie of Chaos, which it uses to take root in weak minds. I believe the corrupted Tech-Priests repeated this phrase like an echo of what had been instilled in them... Whatever the Cult of the Final Dawn is planning, false hope is a key component of their plan. It's a lead. A small one, but still a lead."

languages.text: {n}海因里希叹了口气，放下了手，观察笼子里的生物变成了什么样子。它变成了一团黏糊糊的肉块，这个肉块正在剧烈地颤抖着，失去了所有人类的特征。{/n}“仅仅是这样吗？垂死之人的哀鸣？不，不仅仅只是这样。它刚刚所说的‘希望’，听起来更像是混沌的谎言，用来在脆弱的心灵中扎根。我相信那些堕落的技术神甫们之前重复过这些话，就像他们心中腐化的回声一样……虽然还不知道终末黎明在酝酿什么阴谋，但虚假的希望应该是计划中的关键部分。这是个线索，虽然微不足道，但依然是个线索。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a sigh, Heinrix lowers his hand and looks at what the creature within the cage has become. A wetly gleaming mass of meat and gristle that no longer bears any hint of its human origins, it pulses vigorously.{/n} "And that's it? The lamentations of dying people? No. Not just that. What it said about hope sounds like a lie of Chaos, which it uses to take root in weak minds. I believe the corrupted Tech-Priests repeated this phrase like an echo of what had been instilled in them... Whatever the Cult of the Final Dawn is planning, false hope is a key component of their plan. It's a lead. A small one, but still a lead."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希叹了口气，放下了手，观察笼子里的生物变成了什么样子。它变成了一团黏糊糊的肉块，这个肉块正在剧烈地颤抖着，失去了所有人类的特征。{/n}“仅仅是这样吗？垂死之人的哀鸣？不，不仅仅只是这样。它刚刚所说的‘希望’，听起来更像是混沌的谎言，用来在脆弱的心灵中扎根。我相信那些堕落的技术祭司们之前重复过这些话，就像他们心中腐化的回声一样……虽然还不知道终末黎明在酝酿什么阴谋，但虚假的希望应该是计划中的关键部分。这是个线索，虽然微不足道，但依然是个线索。”

languages.text: {n}Suspirando, Heinrix baja la mano y mira lo que queda de la criatura de la jaula: una masa brillante de carne y cartílago que no conserva rasgo alguno de sus orígenes humanos. Late con violencia.{/n} «¿Eso es todo? ¿Los lamentos de los moribundos? No. Hay algo más. Eso que ha dicho de la esperanza parece una de las mentiras del Caos, que las usa para afianzarse en las mentes débiles. Creo que los tecnosacerdotes corrompidos repetían esa frase, haciéndose eco de lo que les había sido inculcado... Trame lo que trame el Culto del Amanecer Final, la falsa esperanza es un componente clave del plan. Es una pista. Pequeña, pero es una pista».
languages.original_text: {n}With a sigh, Heinrix lowers his hand and looks at what the creature within the cage has become. A wetly gleaming mass of meat and gristle that no longer bears any hint of its human origins, it pulses vigorously.{/n} "And that's it? The lamentations of dying people? No. Not just that. What it said about hope sounds like a lie of Chaos, which it uses to take root in weak minds. I believe the corrupted Tech-Priests repeated this phrase like an echo of what had been instilled in them... Whatever the Cult of the Final Dawn is planning, false hope is a key component of their plan. It's a lead. A small one, but still a lead."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはため息をつきながら手を下ろし、檻の中の生き物がどうなっているかを見た。濡れたように輝く肉と獣肉の塊は、もはや人間であることを微塵も感じさせず、激しく脈打っている。{/n}「それだけか？死にゆく人々の嘆き？いや、それだけじゃない。彼らが言っていた希望という言葉は、渾沌が漬け込む嘘のようなものだろう。堕落した技術司祭たちは、彼らに植えつけられたもののこだまのように、この言葉を繰り返したのだえろうな…最後の夜明け魔女団が何を計画しているにせよ、偽りの希望はその計画の重要な要素だ。手がかりだ。小さなものだが、それでも手がかりなのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}With a sigh, Heinrix lowers his hand and looks at what the creature within the cage has become. A wetly gleaming mass of meat and gristle that no longer bears any hint of its human origins, it pulses vigorously.{/n} "And that's it? The lamentations of dying people? No. Not just that. What it said about hope sounds like a lie of Chaos, which it uses to take root in weak minds. I believe the corrupted Tech-Priests repeated this phrase like an echo of what had been instilled in them... Whatever the Cult of the Final Dawn is planning, false hope is a key component of their plan. It's a lead. A small one, but still a lead."

languages.text: {n}Seufzend senkt Heinrix seine Hand und betrachtet, was aus der Kreatur im Käfig geworden ist. Eine feucht glänzende Masse aus Fleisch und Knorpeln, bei der nichts mehr auf ihren menschlichen Ursprung hinweist. Sie pulsiert rege.{/n} "Und das ist alles? Die Klagen Sterbender? Nein. Nicht nur. Was sie über Hoffnung sagte, klingt wie eine Lüge des Chaos, mit der es in schwachen Geistern Wurzeln schlägt. Ich glaube, die korrumpierten Techpriester haben diesen Satz wiederholt wie ein Echo dessen, was in ihnen selbst angelegt worden war ... Was immer der Kult der letzten Dämmerung vorhat, falsche Hoffnung ist ein wichtiger Bestandteil seines Plans. Das ist eine Spur. Nur eine kleine, aber dennoch eine Spur."
languages.original_text: {n}With a sigh, Heinrix lowers his hand and looks at what the creature within the cage has become. A wetly gleaming mass of meat and gristle that no longer bears any hint of its human origins, it pulses vigorously.{/n} "And that's it? The lamentations of dying people? No. Not just that. What it said about hope sounds like a lie of Chaos, which it uses to take root in weak minds. I believe the corrupted Tech-Priests repeated this phrase like an echo of what had been instilled in them... Whatever the Cult of the Final Dawn is planning, false hope is a key component of their plan. It's a lead. A small one, but still a lead."

Was sie über Hoffnung sagte, klingt wie eine Lüge des Chaos, mit der es in schwachen Geistern Wurzeln schlägt. Ich glaube, die korrumpierten Techpriester haben diesen Satz wiederholt wie ein Echo dessen, was in ihnen selbst angelegt worden war ... Was immer der Kult der letzten Dämmerung vorhat, falsche Hoffnung ist ein wichtiger Bestandteil seines Plans. Das ist eine Spur. Nur eine kleine, aber dennoch eine Spur."

languages.text: {n}Avec un soupir, Heinrix baisse sa main et regarde ce qu'est devenue la créature dans la cage. Il n'en reste qu'un amas de chair brillant d'humidité qui n'a plus rien à voir avec ses origines humaines et palpite vigoureusement.{/n} « C'est tout ? Les lamentations d'une personne à l'agonie ? Non, pas si vite. Ce qu'elle a dit à propos de l'espoir m'évoque les mensonges dont le Chaos se sert pour s'ancrer dans les esprits faibles. Je pense que les technoprêtres corrompus répétaient ces paroles comme un écho de ce qui leur avait été instillé... Quoi que le Culte de l'Aube finale manigance, les faux espoirs sont un élément clé de leur plan. Nous tenons une piste. Ténue, certes, mais elle pourrait tout de même nous mener quelque part. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a sigh, Heinrix lowers his hand and looks at what the creature within the cage has become. A wetly gleaming mass of meat and gristle that no longer bears any hint of its human origins, it pulses vigorously.{/n} "And that's it? The lamentations of dying people? No. Not just that. What it said about hope sounds like a lie of Chaos, which it uses to take root in weak minds. I believe the corrupted Tech-Priests repeated this phrase like an echo of what had been instilled in them... Whatever the Cult of the Final Dawn is planning, false hope is a key component of their plan. It's a lead. A small one, but still a lead."

Il n'en reste qu'un amas de chair brillant d'humidité qui n'a plus rien à voir avec ses origines humaines et palpite vigoureusement.{/n} « C'est tout ? Les lamentations d'une personne à l'agonie ? Non, pas si vite. Ce qu'elle a dit à propos de l'espoir m'évoque les mensonges dont le Chaos se sert pour s'ancrer dans les esprits faibles. Je pense que les technoprêtres corrompus répétaient ces paroles comme un écho de ce qui leur avait été instillé... Quoi que le Culte de l'Aube finale manigance, les faux espoirs sont un élément clé de leur plan. Nous tenons une piste. Ténue, certes, mais elle pourrait tout de même nous mener quelque part. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix iç çekerek elini indiriyor ve kafesteki yaratığın akıbetine bakıyor. İnsanlığından eser kalmamış, ıslak et ve kıkırdak yığını; hareketleriyle hızla çarpan bir kalbi andırıyor.{/n} "Bu kadar mı? Tüm mesele, ölenlerin ağıtlarından mı ibaretti? Yok. Bu olanaksız. Umutla ilgili söyledikleri, bana Kaos yalanlarını hatırlattı. Kaos, bu yalanla zayıf akıllara kök salar. Yozlaşmış Tekno Rahipler, sanki bünyelerine işlenmişçesine bu cümleyi tekrarlıyordu... Nihai Şafak Tarikatı ne planlıyorsa boş umutlar, bunun temel bir parçası. Bu da bir ipucu. Küçük de olsa bir ipucu."
languages.original_text: {n}With a sigh, Heinrix lowers his hand and looks at what the creature within the cage has become. A wetly gleaming mass of meat and gristle that no longer bears any hint of its human origins, it pulses vigorously.{/n} "And that's it? The lamentations of dying people? No. Not just that. What it said about hope sounds like a lie of Chaos, which it uses to take root in weak minds. I believe the corrupted Tech-Priests repeated this phrase like an echo of what had been instilled in them... Whatever the Cult of the Final Dawn is planning, false hope is a key component of their plan. It's a lead. A small one, but still a lead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix iç çekerek elini indiriyor ve kafesteki yaratığın akıbetine bakıyor. İnsanlığından eser kalmamış, ıslak et ve kıkırdak yığını; hareketleriyle hızla çarpan bir kalbi andırıyor.{/n} “Bu kadar mı? Tüm mesele, ölenlerin ağıtlarından mı ibaretti? Yok. Bu olanaksız. Umutla ilgili söyledikleri, bana Kaos yalanlarını hatırlattı. Kaos bu yalanı, zayıf akıllara kök salmak için kullanır. Yozlaşmış Tekno Rahipler, sanki bünyelerine işlenmişçesine bu cümleyi tekrarlıyordu... Nihai Şafak Tarikatı ne planlıyorsa boş umutlar bunun temel bir parçası. Bu da bir ipucu. Küçük de olsa bir ipucu.”
